title: Roles: Humans in the Machine
description: Evolving human roles and responsibilities in increasingly automated systems and AI-augmented organizations.

clusters.title: Management & Leadership
clusters.description: How management and leadership roles transform in AI-integrated environments

eraMapping.onPrem: Manual scheduling, Excel tracking, email coordination with teams
eraMapping.cloudNative: Digital project management tools, real-time collaboration, automated reporting
eraMapping.genAI: AI-powered risk assessment, intelligent resource allocation, predictive timeline adjustments
eraMapping.agenticAI: AI agents handling routine tasks, human focus on strategy and stakeholder relationships
eraMapping.bci: Direct neural interfaces for instant team coordination and intuitive project sensing

clusters.title: Technical & Engineering

eraMapping.cloudNative: DevOps integration, microservices architecture, continuous deployment
